title: I've created this account in NA, confirmed my e-mail but still didn't get the 4 victory's bonus ip
body: I've created this account in NA, confirmed my e-mail but still didn't get the 4 victory's bonus ip, not even in 48 hours and I need so much this boost

replies.body:
No worries! I saw where you verified the email, so I went ahead and added that boost for ya.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
